about_the_game:
The Ravenswatch Digital Artbook includes 150 pages of sketches and illustrations that recount the graphical design of the game, from pencil to 3D. In this jam-packed and lovingly crafted book, Passtech Games also reveals more of the game's lore.

To access the Digital Artbook:
1. Right-click on Ravenswatch in your Steam library
2. Select Manage > Browse local files
3. Open the folder "Artbook"
detailed_description:
The Ravenswatch Digital Artbook includes 150 pages of sketches and illustrations that recount the graphical design of the game, from pencil to 3D. In this jam-packed and lovingly crafted book, Passtech Games also reveals more of the game's lore.

To access the Digital Artbook:
1. Right-click on Ravenswatch in your Steam library
2. Select Manage > Browse local files
3. Open the folder "Artbook"

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
